ProductInfo.Features:
FREE Wide Screen LED Monitor Included In The Package.
8 Cameras: 4*Hidden Cameras, 1/3" SONY CCD, 540 TV Lines, 3.7mm lens, Wide Angle View, Super Small Pinhole Hidden Camera Shaped like a PIR Motion Detector.;; 4*Outdoor/Indoor Cameras, 1/3" SONY CCD, 520 TV lines, 26 IR LEDs. 3.6mm Lens for Wide Angle View, Metal vandal proof & water proof
8 Channel DVR with 2TB HDD: H.264 960H & D1, 960×480 & 30FPS Real time Recording+Playback, Supports HDMI & VGA Outputs. 2 USB port for data backup & mouse operation.
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control.
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support.
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End Professional CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 8 Channel DVR 2TB HDD 960H & 30FPS D1 Real-Time Recording+Playback, (8 Cameras) 4 SONY CCD Hidden Camera 540TVL, 4 SONY CCD Outdoor or Indoor Camera 520TVL, iPhone Android Viewable
